summary: The MkDocs AI Summary Update Log introduces new features like multi-AI service support, adaptive environment configuration, and intelligent caching. It offers flexible options for precise folder control, exclusion patterns, and page-level settings. Technical features include unified API integration, error handling, and display optimizations. Planned features include multi-AI support, secure API key management, and batch processing mode. The system ensures efficient AI summary generation with language support and content cleaning mechanisms.
page_title: MkDocs AI 摘要更新日志
